description.value:
You conjure a wagon that can seat four medium creatures. A large creature counts as four medium creatures and tiny creatures count as one half a medium creature The wagon is clearly phantasmal in nature. If it's reduced to 0 Hit Points, it disappears and the spell ends. The wagon has the following stats. Its level is equal to twice the spell level.

Crag's Coachman Vehicle X

Large

Price nil

Space 10 feet long, 10 feet wide, 4 feet high

Crew None; Passengers see above

Piloting Check It uses the caster's tradition-appropriate skill (@Check[arcana] or @Check[occultism])

AC 20; Fort +6

Hardness 4, HP 10 (BT 5); Immunities critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

Speed 40 feet Collision 1d10 (DC 14)

Heightened (+1) Toughen: Increase the HP of the wagon by 5, its BT by 2, and its AC by 2.

Heightened (+1) Speed: Increase its Speed by 5 feet.

Heightened (+1) Sure Footed: The wagon can roll on water, and ignores areas of natural difficult terrain.

Heightened (+1) Air Walking: It can also air walk but must end its turn on solid ground or fall.

Heightened (+1) Size: It can carry one additional medium creature.
